title: Sarah M.
description: I came in with chronic neck and shoulder pain and felt real relief after a few sessions. Dr. Dan is thoughtful, gentle, and explains every step.

title: Jason R.
description: Acupuncture helped my stress and sleep more than I expected. I now sleep through the night and feel much more balanced during the day.

title: Emily T.
description: I started treatment for menstrual irregularity and PMS. The care plan was personalized and compassionate, and my symptoms improved month by month.
